message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product which I know you're interested in. I'm asking for $140 for it.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I appreciate your interest.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $135.  It's still a great deal for you, and it allows me to make a bit more than my minimum. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit higher than $135. Would you be willing to meet me at $125?
